Description: Fragment of neck and oval handle to sharpish turn of a Rhodian pottery transport amphora. Clay fine buff-brown; cream slip. Rectangular stamp.
Curator's comments: Ink, deleted, '10.' Name Archinos. From same die as Alexandria, Greco-Roman Museum, ABC 0098.09.
Bibliographic references: Stoddart 1847 / Memoir on the inscribed pottery of Rhodes, Cnidus and other Greek Cities (47)
